dataModel.title: Vegetation Plots Database Component Description: note
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table is where notations associated with table records are stored
entity.entityDescription: All notes associated with plots and plot observations are stored in this table. These notes can be linked to any table, record and attribute via the noteLink table.

attribute.attNotes: Primary key for the note table
attribute.attDefinition: Database generated identifier assigned to each unique note.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the notelink table
attribute.attDefinition: Link to the noteLink table via which a note is associated with a table, record and attribute.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the party table
attribute.attDefinition: Link to the party table to identify the party that contributed the note.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the aux_role table
attribute.attDefinition: What role was the party palying when the note was applied?
The date on which the note was stored in the database.

The type of note: Database Management, Observation Author, Database User and Internal. "Database Managment" notes are those added by the management team and may be queried and viewed by the public. "Database Use" notes are those entered by the users of the database and are publicly viewable. "Internal" notes are for management to use internally and will not be broadcast.
